channel.subtitle: 满眼皆是欢喜，朝霞不如你
channel.description: 允公允能 日新月异

item.title: Electrodynamics2
电动力学笔记(一):数学基础
一些生活小常识
量子力学笔记(一)
高斯光束和拓展
item.description: <div class="note default"> <p>这是一篇关于高斯光束相关知识的整理</p> </div> <p>Laguerre-Guassian Beam</p> <p><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>u</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>r</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>ϕ</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>z</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi>C</mi><mrow><mi>l</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi><mi>G</mi></mrow></msubsup><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>w</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>z</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo fence="true">(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>r</mi><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mi>w</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>z</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi><mi>l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi></mrow></msup><mi>exp</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><msup><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>z</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow><msubsup><mi>L</mi><mi>p</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi><mi>l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo fence="true">(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>z</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mi>exp</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>z</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow><mi>exp</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>i</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>ϕ</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>exp</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mi>ψ</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>z</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">u(r, \phi, z) = C_{lp}^{LG} \frac{1}{w(z)} \left(\frac{r\sqrt{2}}{w(z)}\right)^{|l|} \exp\left(-\frac{r^2}{w^2(z)}\right) L_p^{|l|}\left(\frac{2r^2}{w^2(z)}\right) \times \exp\left(-\frac{ik r^2}{2R(z)}\right)\exp(-il\phi) \exp(i\psi(z)), </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.04398em;">z</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msubsup><mi>C</mi><mrow><mi>l</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi><mi>G</mi></mrow></msubsup></mrow><annotation mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">L</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">G</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s">​</span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.4192159999999999em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span> 归一化是所需要的系数:</p> <p><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><msubsup><mi>C</mi><mrow><mi>l</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi><mi>G</mi></mrow></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>p</mi><mo stretchy="false">!</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi><mi>l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">!</mo></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>⇒</mo><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></msubsup><mi>d</mi><mi>ϕ</mi><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></msubsup><mi>d</mi><mi>r</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi><mi>u</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>r</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>ϕ</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>z</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">∣</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_{lp}^{LG} = \sqrt{\frac{2p!}{\pi(p + |l|)!}} \Rightarrow \int_0^{2\pi} d\phi \int_0^{\infty} dr \, r |u(r, \phi, z)|^2 = 1, </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1.274439em;vertical-align:-0.383108em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">ϕ</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mop"><span class="mop op-symbol large-op" style="margin-right:0.44445em;position:relative;top:-0.0011249999999999316em;">∫</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:1.414292em;"><span style="top:-1.7880500000000001em;margin-left:-0.44445em;margin-right:0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight">0</span></span></span><span style="top:-3.8129000000000004em;margin-right:0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">∞</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s">​</span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.9119499999999999em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">d</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02778em;">r</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02778em;">r</span><span class="mord">∣</span><span class="mord mathnormal">u</span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.02778em;">r</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">ϕ</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.04398em;">z</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">∣</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.8641079999999999em;"><span style="top:-3.113em;margin-right:0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.8388800000000001em;vertical-align:-0.19444em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mpunct">,</span></span></span></span></span></p> <p>matlab 代码可定义为：</p> <p><figure class="highlight matlab"><figcaption><span>LG-Beam 定义</span></figcaption><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title">outoam</span>=<span class="title">LGB2</span><span class="params">(lambda,w0,x,y,z,l,p)</span></span></span><br><span class="line">[phi,r]=<span class="built_in">cart2pol</span>(x,y);</span><br><span class="line">k=<span class="number">2</span>*<span class="built_in">pi</span>/lambda;</span><br><span class="line">zr=<span class="number">0.5</span>*k*w0.^<span class="number">2</span>;</span><br><span class="line">q=z+(<span class="built_in">sqrt</span>(<span class="number">-1</span>)*(<span class="number">-1</span>)).*zr;</span><br><span class="line">q0=<span class="number">-1</span><span class="built_in">i</span>*zr;</span><br><span class="line">w=<span class="built_in">pi</span>.^(<span class="number">-1</span>/<span class="number">2</span>).*(lambda.*zr.^(<span class="number">-1</span>).*(z.^<span class="number">2</span>+zr.^<span class="number">2</span>)).^(<span class="number">1</span>/<span class="number">2</span>);</span><br><span class="line">out1=<span class="number">2.</span>^((<span class="number">1</span>/<span class="number">2</span>)+(<span class="number">1</span>/<span class="number">2</span>).*<span class="built_in">abs</span>(l)).*<span class="built_in">exp</span>(<span class="number">1</span>).^(<span class="built_in">sqrt</span>(<span class="number">-1</span>).*l.*phi+(<span class="built_in">sqrt</span>(<span class="number">-1</span>)*( ...</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="number">1</span>/<span class="number">2</span>)).*k.*q.^(<span class="number">-1</span>).*r.^<span class="number">2</span>).*<span class="built_in">pi</span>.^(<span class="number">-1</span>/<span class="number">2</span>).*(r.*w.^(<span class="number">-1</span>)).^<span class="built_in">abs</span>(l).*w.^( ...</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="number">-1</span>).*(q.^(<span class="number">-1</span>).*q0.*<span class="built_in">conj</span>(q).*<span class="built_in">conj</span>(q0).^(<span class="number">-1</span>)).^((<span class="number">1</span>/<span class="number">2</span>).*(<span class="number">1</span>+ ...</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="number">2.</span>*p+<span class="built_in">abs</span>(l))).*(<span class="built_in">factorial</span>(p).*<span class="built_in">factorial</span>(p+<span class="built_in">abs</span>(l)).^(<span class="number">-1</span>)).^(<span class="number">1</span>/<span class="number">2</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">La=Laguerre(p,<span class="built_in">abs</span>(l),<span class="number">2.</span>*<span class="built_in">pi</span>.^<span class="number">2.</span>*r.^<span class="number">2.</span>*w0.^<span class="number">2.</span>*(<span class="built_in">pi</span>.^<span class="number">2.</span>*w0.^<span class="number">4</span>+lambda.^<span class="number">2.</span>*z.^<span class="number">2</span>).^(<span class="number">-1</span>));<span class="comment">%调用LG 多项式</span></span><br><span class="line">outoam=out1.*La;</span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">end</span></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure></p> <p>其中:</p> <p><figure class="highlight matlab"><figcaption><span>Laguerre 公式</span></figcaption><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title">y</span>=<span class="title">Laguerre</span><span class="params">(p,l,x)</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">%%This file generates the Laguerre functions stired in the variable &quot;y&quot; The</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">%%inputs are: the indices &quot;p&quot;,&quot;l&quot; and the vector &quot;x&quot;.</span></span><br><span class="line">y=<span class="built_in">zeros</span>(p+<span class="number">1</span>,<span class="number">1</span>);</span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">if</span> p==<span class="number">0</span></span><br><span class="line"> y=<span class="number">1</span>;</span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">else</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">for</span> m=<span class="number">0</span>:p</span><br><span class="line"> y(p+<span class="number">1</span>-m)=((<span class="number">-1</span>).^m.*(<span class="built_in">factorial</span>(p+l)))./(<span class="built_in">factorial</span>(p-m).*<span class="built_in">factorial</span>(l+m).*<span class="built_in">factorial</span>(m));</span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">end</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">end</span></span><br><span class="line">y=polyval(y,x);</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure></p> <p><img data-src alt></p>

item.title: 光子
句子摘抄
科研能力训练笔记
